definition: to estimate/to guess/to figure/to surmise
to put into (one's pockets, clothes)/Taiwan pr. [chuai3]
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to guess/to conjecture
to analyze/to try to figure out/to try to fathom
to estimate/to surmise/to appraise
to conjecture
to venture to/to presume to/to take the liberty of
soft, fat meat of pig's belly/sow's sagging teats/weakling/flabby person/also written 囊膪
to speculate/to conjecture
to tuck into one's bosom/also written 搋在懷裡|搋在怀里

sentences.english: He had only about a sixpence in his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 当时他口袋里仅揣有一枚六便士的硬币。

sentences.english: The boy’s hands are pulled up inside the cuffs of his shirt.
sentences.chinese: 男孩的手揣在衬衣袖口里面。

sentences.english: They are great just to keep in your purse or diaper bag for on the go.
sentences.chinese: 在钱袋或是尿布包里揣上一包会很方便。

sentences.english: She was trying to figure out what would happen next.
sentences.chinese: 她心里揣想着接下去会发生什么情况。

sentences.english: The letter has been in my pocket all the time.
sentences.chinese: 这封信一直揣在我口袋里。

sentences.english: Author bold mean, plans to make a preliminary discussion in light of this, asks respectfully to point out mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 笔者不揣浅陋，拟就此作一初步探讨，敬请指正。

sentences.english: The poet could carry all his effusions about in his pockets.
sentences.chinese: 我这个“小诗人”把所有的诗作都揣在口袋里。

sentences.english: In their lace mitts , austere and sweet.
sentences.chinese: 揣在花边手套里，朴实可人。

sentences.english: The Chen Hong skill Chuai raises oil lamp down all solo in the brisket.
sentences.chinese: 沈鸿一手揣在怀里，一手举着油灯下来。

sentences.english: Twist one shredded paper ink, put a sentiment, in the impression the drafting of old Berlin.
sentences.chinese: 捻一纸碎墨，揣一份情愫，在印象里起草旧时的柏林。

sentences.english: Eponine had put the letter in her pocket.
sentences.chinese: 爱潘妮却把信揣了在她的衣袋里。

sentences.english: It always cherishes the love for human's noble character and sterling integrity.
sentences.chinese: 始终揣怀着对人类高风亮节的爱。

sentences.english: He had but to keep this note in his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 他只消把这信揣在衣袋里。
她把生日贺卡揣在怀里。

to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
strategic pass/tactical border position
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with
to fish out/to take out (from a pocket, bag etc)
full and bulging (of a pocket, pouch etc)
to lift/to carry in one's hand/Taiwan pr. [ling1]
to carry
sleeve
to enclose/to cover with the hand (one's eyes, nose or ears)/to cover up (an affair)/contrary/to contradict
pants pocket

pocket/bag/to wrap up or hold in a bag/to move in a circle/to canvas or solicit/to take responsibility for/to disclose in detail/combat armor (old)
